title: It's time to admit we have a problem
body: It's time to admit we have a problem when even professional teams are playing triple ADC comps. Part of the problem is that their items are just flat-out _better_ than anyone else's. Keystone masteries are also wildly in their favor over almost any other class

replies.body:
Another thing to keep in mind: These are the pros making these plays, not a disorganized soloqq comp. They're playing for lots and lots of money, of course they're going to play the comps that give them the most edge. And since they likely spend hours and hours co-ordinating together to make these sorts of comps work...

Not saying there isn't a problem with some champions, and items, but some of the things that work in the LCS work simply because of the team, not because of the champions and/or items.

I got to be perfectly honest, I don't see triple adc comps much anymore.  Maybe sometimes double adc if they got corki, ez or jhin mid. Triple only happens if the jungler/top is graves or quinn (and quinn doesn't really feel like an adc, more of a burst assasin with nice map mobility).

Just pick rammus, malph or taric into that comp.  

Also side note:  Think the ap itemization is getting an update with the upcoming mage update.
